statements: SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_status='pending';
SELECT applicant_name FROM citizenship_applications WHERE applicant_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications ORDER BY application_id DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM citizenship_applications WHERE review_stage='final';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications WHERE applicant_age > 18 ORDER BY application_id DESC
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications WHERE review_stage = 'Initial Review' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, review_stage FROM citizenship_applications WHERE applicant_age <= 30
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM citizenship_applications WHERE applicant_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY application_id
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, submission_date, status FROM citizenship_applications WHERE status='pending';
SELECT applicant_name, review_stage FROM citizenship_applications ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, status, review_stage FROM citizenship_applications WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, comment, comment_date FROM review_comments ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, submission_date, status FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, submission_date, status FROM citizenship_applications WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, status, review_stage FROM citizenship_applications WHERE review_stage='Initial' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications JOIN review_comments ON citizenship_applications.application_id = review_comments.application_id;

SELECT applicant_name, reviewer_name, comment FROM citizenship_applications JOIN review_comments ON citizenship_applications.application_id = review_comments.application_id WHERE reviewer_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM document_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, approval_status FROM approval_status WHERE approval_status = 'approved' ORDER BY approval_date;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM citizenship_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM document_reviews WHERE review_comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT a.applicant_name, b.reviewer_name, b.review_date FROM citizenship_applications a JOIN document_reviews b ON a.application_id = b.application_id;
SELECT a.applicant_name, b.approval_status, c.approval_date FROM citizenship_applications a JOIN approval_status c ON a.application_id = c.application_id WHERE c.approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date, current_stage FROM citizenship_applications;
SELECT * FROM application_review WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT application_id, review_date, review_comments FROM application_review ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM review_stages WHERE description LIKE '%approved%';
SELECT application_id, approval_date, approval_status FROM approval_status WHERE approval_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_applications WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM citizenship_applications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT citizenship_applications.*, review_comments FROM citizenship_applications JOIN application_review ON citizenship_applications.application_id = application_review.application_id WHERE application_review.reviewer_name = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY application_review.review_date DESC;

SELECT applicant_name, approval_date, approval_status FROM citizenship_applications JOIN approval_status ON citizenship_applications.application_id = approval_status.application_id WHERE approval_status.approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT application_id, stage_name, description FROM citizenship_applications JOIN review_stages ON citizenship_applications.current_stage = review_stages.stage_name;
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE application_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM ApplicationReview ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_status, submitted_date FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE submitted_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT application_id, review_result FROM ApplicationReview WHERE review_result='Approved' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM CitizenshipApplications WHERE review_stage = 1;
SELECT application_id, submitted_date FROM CitizenshipApplications ORDER BY submitted_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_result FROM ApplicationReview WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT application_id, event_description FROM ApplicationHistory WHERE event_type = 'Status Update' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
